snippet: "Robot & Frank" is one of several films that sketch out a vision of a future that won't arrive with exaggerated fanfare; it will most likely set up shop nearly unnoticed, possibly even installed in your living room by your next of kin. Read more »

headline.main: In Films, Technology of the Not-So-Distant Future on Display
